name: Ansh Prajapati

services.title: Art Direction
services.description: We help with the creation and development of online advertising ideas, with particular focus on their visual appearance.

services.title: Branding
services.description: We design key brand elements such as the logo, color scheme, typography, and other design components that makes your brand stand out from competitors.

services.title: Web Design
services.description: We build and optimize your online presence.  Website is the digital entry point into your business and a powerful revenue channel.

services.title: 3D Design
services.description: We combine creative design and technical skills to build striking 3D visualisations that bring your project to life.

aboutpara: I am a passionate and driven software engineer with a focus on building scalable and user-friendly applications. With a solid foundation in React, JavaScript, and modern web frameworks, I have successfully contributed to creating products that offer exceptional user experiences. Over the years, I have honed my skills not just in coding, but also in product design, and I strive to bridge the gap between aesthetics and functionality. I am constantly learning and evolving, embracing new challenges that help me grow both as a developer and as a designer.

education.universityName: St. Clair College of Applied Arts and Technology
education.universityPara: St. Clair College of Applied Arts and Technology offers a dynamic learning environment that fosters both academic and personal growth. My education here has equipped me with essential skills in technology and innovation, preparing me to excel in the fast-evolving tech industry. Through hands-on experience and a robust curriculum, I have gained practical knowledge in various areas, which has significantly broadened my understanding and passion for the field.
